name: BEST WESTERN Aspen Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2014, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived the hotel looked dated and a very basic motel from the outside but only a 1 night stopover so we thought it would be ok.
reviews.title: far better than expected from outside view
Great place to stay if you driving through Gippsland
reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise inside. Clean modern room with great shower and best of all 2 very comfortable Reclining armchairs. There was a good choice of films on the tv and we had a nice change having evening meal and a bottle of wine in chairs as comfortable as at home.
Hosts also very helpful. Would recommend.
reviews.title: Great Service and an unexpected Bonus

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic value hotel with all the amenities you need for a one to 2 night stay. We stayed at a 2 bedroom apartment during the weekend. Service is fantastic. Craig at reception was extremely helpful and friendly. Sale is a lovely town. We will certainly come back next time we are around!
reviews.title: Room was a bit claustrophobic and had strange bathroom facilities
Comfy with an odd bathroom
reviews.text: As it was a last minute trip we hadn't booked but just drove in off the street. There was only one motel room left, which we had a quick look at but is was rather small.

aka: BEST WESTERN Aspen Motor Inn Sale, Australia - Victoria
description: 24 Motel rooms,Queen Rooms and Family rooms available, we have 81 Austar TV Channels available, all motel rooms have 32" flat screens and full recliners,IPhone alarm clocks and full breakfast is available, there is a comprehensive mini bar in all rooms. We also have FREE Wifi to all rooms. Charge back facility available to all restaurants within the town. We have both 2 and 3 bedroom fully self catered Apartments, the 3 bedroom have been accredited 4 star ratings through AAA and we have renovated our 2 bedroom Apartments, give us a call for the best affordable Apartments within the Town of Sale. The Apartments are fully self catered and the TV's are all 42". Currently we are in the process of upgrading all Motel Rooms, so if you are after friendly service and a quiet rooms out of the hustle and bustle, look no further. We do not surcharge on any Credit Cards. We are also proud to have been awarded the Best 3.5 Star Best Western Hotel in Australasia for 2012.
